clinical_study.brief_title: Observational Study on Patients With Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC)
clinical_study.official_title: Observational Study on Patients With Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC)

lead_sponsor.agency: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

clinical_study.source: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: This is an ongoing, longitudinal, single centre, observational, retro-prospective clinical cohort study of patients with HCC in usual clinical practice. All the HCC patients diagnosed and treated in Liver Cancer Center, Nanfang Hospital are consecutively collected and followed up.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the overall survival rate of all HCC patients
primary_outcome.description: In order to identify the potential influence factors of HCC patients survival

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the recurrence free survival rate of HCC patients after curative treatments
primary_outcome.description: In order to identify the potential influence factors of tumor recurrence

study_pop.textblock: Patients diagnosed and treated as HCC in Liver Cancer Center, Nanfang Hospital
